## hpr1592 :: An Open Source News Break from Opensource.com

 In this episode: Open source CMS applications go head-to-head, open source tools for making presentations, and WikiProject Med.
Links:

https://opensource.com/business/14/6/open-source-cms-joomla-wordpress-drupal
https://opensource.com/life/14/7/3-open-source-tools-make-your-presentations-pop
https://opensource.com/health/14/6/doctors-unite-increase-access-quality-health-information
